metadata.title: CVE-2023-20588 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description: A division-by-zero error on some AMD processors can potentially returnspeculative data resulting in loss of confidentiality.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
